name: Crossed Paths:Connected Worlds
description: Crossed Paths:Connected Worlds is a finished visual novel about a high school senior named Claire who's life keeps throwing things at her and feels she's at her breaking point, when she finds a mysterious necklace in the woods. That night she meets Sophronia, a girl her age with the exact same necklace who tells Claire that their necklaces have the ability to travel to other worlds! This game features 2 alternate endings, so be sure to go back once you get one ending!
